abstract: Former Gov. Martin O’Malley of Maryland has been promoting himself to Democrats as a potential alternative to Hillary Rodham Clinton in the 2016 race for the White House.

headline.main: O’Malley Speaks Out Against Possible Dynastic Rematch for White House

snippet: Former Gov. Martin O’Malley of Maryland has been promoting himself to Democrats as a potential alternative to Hillary Rodham Clinton in the 2016 race for the White House.
